recipe.title: Keto Lava Chocolate Mug Cake
recipe.comment: c/o The Diet Chef with cazzie tweaks
recipe.ingredient: 2 TBsp Monkfruit or coconut or stevia sugar
recipe.step: In a ramekin or large mug, melt the butter in a microwave, let cool while you get other ingredients out.
Mix the egg and vanilla essence in the mug/ramekin with the cooled butter until combined.
Add all other dry ingredients (except the chopped chocolate) and stir to combine.
Cook in the microwave for 20 seconds, then pour the chopped chocolate in the centre and gently push down with your fingers.
Place back in the microwave and cook for a further 30-40 seconds or until firm on top.
Serve with a sprinkle of extra cocoa and coconut yogurt or whipped cream.
